data.htmlContent: Hey pasta lovers! üçù Ever get that sudden, undeniable craving for endless breadsticks and a giant bowl of Fettuccine Alfredo? You're in the right place! Finding an Olive Garden near you is now easier than saying 'Tour of Italy'. Below you'll find our super-handy interactive map and a complete list of locations. Your next great meal is just a click away! üöÄ
Did you know Olive Garden has over 900 locations across the U.S.? That's a lot of breadsticks! Texas leads the pack with over 100 restaurants. Check out the top states and cities below! üëá
